trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event occurs when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> is added or removed from a managed collection of such lists.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento si verifica quando un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>viene aggiunto o rimosso da una raccolta gestita di tali elenchi.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when an individual list element changes its value.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento non viene generato quando viene modificato un singolo elemento dell'elenco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is generated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento viene generato dal <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>quando viene chiamato il relativo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A>metodi vengono eseguiti.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter will always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento, il `relatedObject` parametro sempre riferimento il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>che il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>è associato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che è associato alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> has been added or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che specifica se un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> è stato aggiunto o rimosso dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The collection of list elements after the action has been applied.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi dell'elenco dopo che è stata applicata l'azione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> gli oggetti associati a questo evento.

trans-unit.source: The retrieved <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> represents the state of the collection after the event, which involved adding or removing an element, has been applied.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto recuperato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>rappresenta lo stato della raccolta dopo l'evento, che comportato l'aggiunta o rimozione di un elemento, è stato applicato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that represents the current state of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> che rappresenta lo stato corrente della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether an element has been added or removed from the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un flag che indica se un elemento è stato aggiunto o rimosso dalla raccolta di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Altering the contents of an existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> in the collection will not raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Se si modifica il contenuto di un oggetto esistente <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>nella raccolta non genererà un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType"></xref> that indicates the type of change.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType"> </xref> che indica il tipo di modifica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that that is associated with the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto che è associato all'insieme di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà RelatedObject fa consente al programmatore di associare un oggetto a un'istanza di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the RelatedObject property should always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento, la proprietà RelatedObject fa deve sempre fare riferimento il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>che il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>è associato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>
